explains: adj. 极为痛苦的，极为难受的
v. 猛扭；扭伤；歪曲；用版钳拧（wrench 的现在分词形式）
wordGroup: monkey wrench n. 活动扳手；螺旋钳
torque wrench 扭力扳手；转矩扳手；定力矩扳手
pipe wrench 管扳钳；管子钳
impact wrench 拧紧扳手，套筒板手；冲头

sentences.en: He grabbed Ben, wrenching him away from his mother.
sentences.cn: 他抓住本，把他从他母亲那里一把抢走了。

sentences.en: Going to court can be an expensive, time-consuming, and gut-wrenching experience that is best avoided.
sentences.cn: 上法庭会是种费钱，费时间，并带来精神痛苦的经历，最好能加以避免。

sentences.en: The adjustment that follows may be wrenching.
sentences.cn: 行业的后续调整想必是痛苦的。
